name: Frogs 'n' Flies
description:
Frogs 'n' Flies is a small arcade game, made in 24 hours, in which the player controls five individual frogs who each respond to a different keyboard button. 

Pressing each frog's unique button and holding it will extend that frog's tongue and allow them to catch flies.

The player has 60 seconds in which to catch as many flies as they can with the tips of the frogs' tongues!

What will your highest score be?
